description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This isn’t your classical Snake, no no no. This is Snake Jam!  With modern graphics and a killer physics engine.  Enjoy single player, or challenge up to four of your friends to a game. How much fruit can you eat?!
